price: (Matootiin warra ibiddaa) Ni jedhu: “Maaliif namoota (duniyatti) warra baay’ee badii hojjatan irraa lakkaa’aa turre (asitti) hin argine?
arabic: وَقَالُواْ مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالٗا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَشۡرَارِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waqālū mā lanā lā narā rijālan kunnā naʿudduhum mina al-ashrāri
